snippet: Shares in SABMiller were up 9 percent after it agreed to be taken over by Anheuser-Busch InBev. Twitter was up 1 percent after announcing layoffs.
abstract: Stocks in United States drop as investors digest company reports and corporate deal news; markets had not dropped for previous five days.
lead_paragraph: Shares in SABMiller were up 9 percent after it agreed to be taken over by Anheuser-Busch InBev. Twitter was up 1 percent after announcing layoffs.

headline.main: A Dip in the Market as Investors Dissect Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: A Dip as Investors Dissect Earnings Reports and Deals
